Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
Matrix
Direct Known Subclasses:
Vector
public class Matrix extends Object
This class represents a matrix with specific rows and columns
Author:
Edward Zhang

      Mutator method to set specific element in matrix to new value
      Parameters:
      r - row of matrix
      c - column of matrix
